attributes.action: reduce tax on petrol and diesel, enough is enough
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are the most taxed country in the world for petrol and diesel and I for one am sick of it. I have just returned from the Czech Rep where fuel is just £0.70 per litre, and also South Africa where it is just £0.50 per litre, come on Mr Brown, show us something nice for a change instead of rises!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
